@DR_Kronenbourg You weirdo! Was up there about 10 years ago having to deliver a laptop a customer left behind. There was nothing there and the building to the left was boarded up! Now there's so much stuff, that I may have looked into if it wasn't so brutal 😂💨
@DR_Kronenbourg Aye but I was paying for it and you get paid for it 😂😂
